mapper.insert: insert into product( product_code, product_writer, product_title, product_maincategory, product_subcategory, product_origin, product_made, product_price, product_stock, product_contents, file, contentsfile) values ( #{product.product_code}, #{product.product_writer}, #{product.product_title}, #{product.product_maincategory}, #{product.product_subcategory}, #{product.product_origin}, #{product.product_made}, #{product.product_price}, #{product.product_stock}, #{product.product_contents}, #{product.file}, #{product.contentsfile})
insert into basket( basket_product_code, basket_member_id, cnt, basket_total ) values( #{cPVo.product_code}, #{member_id}, #{cnt}, #{product_total} )
mapper.select: SELECT basket_no, basket.basket_product_code, product.product_title, product.product_price, basket.cnt, basket.deliverycost, basket.basket_total , basket_member_id, basket.basket_state FROM basket join product on basket.basket_product_code=product.product_code join member on basket.basket_member_id=member.member_id where basket_state = 'I' and member_id=#{member_id};
mapper.update: update basket set basket_state='D' where basket_no=#{basket_no}
